name: Nothing to Everything
description:
This is a card game I made for Ludum Dare 45 Compo event.

There are mainly two different kinds of card.
1. Behavior Card. The basic type of card you will use to fight your enemy. You start with 0 behavior card in each level, and get one more hand card every round up until 4.
2. Thing Card. You start with a thing card called nothing, which can literally do nothing. You will be able to access different "Thing Cards" as you goes to higher level.
 

There are totally 7 levels.

Please feel free to play and leave your feedback. I really appreciate it!

Updates:

10/7/2019: Upload WebGL version
